document_data.name: Mount Wolf
document_data.mainbody: '''Mount Wolf''' was a mountain in [[the Vast]] in [[north Faer√ªn]]. It lay within the [[Giantspike Mountains]], a part of the [[Earthspur Mountains]], and towered over the [[North Road]] south of [[Maskyr's Eye]]. It marked the proper border of the lands of the Vast and was a prominent local landmark to both the [[human]] and [[dwarf]] inhabitants of the land.{{Cite polyhedron/55/The Everwinking Eye: A Closer Look at Maskyr's Eye|25}}
document_data.Flora & Fauna: Once, packs of gray [[wolves]] made their lairs close to the peak, but they competed with local hunters for the highly valued [[stag]]s in the area. The hunters culled many wolves and reduced their numbers significantly.
document_data.Rumors & Legends: The sage [[Elminster]] of [[Shadowdale]] estimated that the legendary [[Mount Grimmerfang]] was the first peak north-east of Mount Wolf. However, he'd not investigated this himself to confirm.<ref group="note">The map on page 145 of ''[[The City of Ravens Bluff]]'', shown in the sidebar, shows that Mount Grimmerfang is in fact south-east of Mount Wolf.
